demographics.name: The name of the patient is Michael Smith

social_background.major_support: Lives with Mom (Cheryl), also his HCP and caretaker
social_background.work_history: Former line cook at a restaurant; currently unemployed
social_background.income: On disability, receives $13,000/year from social security
social_background.beliefs: Believes in God but does not actively practice or think about it much

family_history.mother: Alive, 61 years old, has T2DM, HTN, HLP
family_history.father: Deceased in 2018, liver failure, alcohol abuse, HTN

conditions: Substance misuse (alcohol, marijuana, cocaine – all ceased in 2019)
Motor vehicle accident in Dec 2019 → C4 complete fracture → quadriplegia
Chronic stage 3 (now stage 4) coccyx pressure injury
medical_history.health_perception: Patient perceives health as mediocre; admits neglect with diet and movement; sees PCP 2x/year

mental_health.depression: Ongoing; expresses guilt and frustration over dependency
mental_health.substance_recovery: Clean since 2019 from alcohol, marijuana, cocaine
mental_health.coping: Struggles but actively engaged in therapy

functional_status.mobility: Quadriplegic with spasticity in all limbs; uses electric wheelchair with sip-and-puff joystick
functional_status.relationship_status: Good with mother; working on sister relationship
functional_status.activity_order: OOB with Hoyer to WC three times daily for meals as tolerated
functional_status.repositioning: Bedfast, cannot reposition self; frequent sliding due to spasticity

surgeries: C4-C5 anterior cervical discectomy and fusion (2019)

er_admission.reason: Fever and worsening stage 4 coccyx wound
er_admission.symptoms: Foul drainage, pressure sensation, no pain

oral: Miralax (polyethylene glycol) 17g in 6 oz water PO daily

nutrition_and_gi.pattern: Eats >50% of most meals, 4 servings of protein/day, sometimes takeout

urinary.condition: Neurogenic bladder with chronic indwelling catheter

bowel.compliance: Missed some doses over last 2 weeks

ears.subjective: Denies drainage, itching, vertigo, hearing loss, or tinnitus

sleep.issues: Goes to bed late, trouble falling asleep

wound_and_skin.pressure_injury: Stage 4 coccyx ulcer with green/yellow/bloody drainage and foul odor
wound_and_skin.additional_skin: Small red blister at inferior urethral meatus

sexuality_and_reproductive.finding: Small red blister to inferior urethral meatus

value_and_belief.beliefs: Believes in God but does not actively practice or think about it much
